Texts.Chs: 那么，它们是某种反于星之子的存在吗？阴阳相生？黑暗之光？我的理论是，也许有更多的东西，早于所有已知的生命，早于耕耘者。可能他们甚至是伴侣！这种事情有可能发生吗？在众星之中，有没有一个女性的耕耘者？
Texts.Eng: Are they, then, some sort of anti-Novakid? A Yang to their Yin? The Shadow to their Light? I theorize that there are perhaps more things that predate all known life beyond just the Cultivator. Perhaps even a mate! Could such a thing be possible? Is there, somewhere among the stars, a female counterpart to the Cultivator?

Texts.Chs: 这肯定会让他们对母亲的看法更加可信。大多数人认为他们蜂巢般的精神连接只不过是一种超越我们所知的灵能连接... 但是他们可能错了，他们实际上正在与某种巨大而古老的力量交流(或者是它们的一部分)呢？某种生物引出了所有的黑暗，而耕耘者引出了光明？
Texts.Eng: It would certainly make their notion of Mother more credible. Most think their Hive-like mental link is nothing more than a psionic connection that goes beyond all we know...but what if they are wrong and they are in fact communing with (or are pieces of) some massive and ancient power? Some sort of being that gave rise to all of the Darkness, while the Cultivator gave rise to Light?

Texts.Chs: 许多人确信星之子是耕耘者的碎片，这个古老的种子负责播种我们所知的宇宙，并产生所有的东西。如果是这样的话，我们该如何解释影族的存在？所有的测试似乎都表明它们的起源是无可追朔的，而且它们的本质也将它们与宇宙的物质联系在一起。
Texts.Eng: Many are certain that the Novakid are fragments of the Cultivator, that ancient being responsible for seeding the cosmos with what we know and giving birth to all things. If this is the case, how do we explain the presence of the Tenebrhae? All tests seem to point to them being truly ancient in origin, and their very natures link them to the stuff of the cosmos as well.
